name: The Campfire (SpyDaniel)
description:
This is my entry to the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022). It is my first ever game jam entry.

The game is multiplayer but can be played solo if no other players are online.

The aim of the game is to keep the campfire lit, by chopping trees down for logs, but there is a catch, you start with no cash; no hatchet. You must find a way to make money to buy a hatchet to keep the fire stoked. Watch out for skeletons.

In the game, you can do a number of things, but finding out is part of the fun right?

The main menu has an information tab, showing controls and credits, but i'll list them here too:

A and D to Move
Space to jump/double jump and to swim
S to interact
I to toggle inventory visibility
Q, E and F for equipment
